game intro:
[b]Welcome to ALYA![/b]

This is a text-based adventure. To play, type a command into the console and hit enter.

If you get stuck, try typing 'help' to see a list of available commands.

alya's room.name: Alya's Room
alya's room.intro:
It's finally here!

Today's the day Alya sets off on her big adventure!

She wakes up in her bedroom. It's the same as always: the south-facing [b]window[/b], the tidy [b]desk[/b], the elaborate [b]doll house[/b] in the corner.

But today, something is different. Alya can't put her finger on it, but the familiar comforts of her room seem somehow livelier than usual.

It's a great day for adventure!

 (!) HINT: Use 'examine <target>' to explore Alya's room!
alya's room.description: Everything in Alya's room is the same as always: the south-facing [b]window[/b], the tidy writing [b]desk[/b], the elaborate [b]doll house[/b] in the corner.

window.description:
The morning sunlight warms Alya's face as she peers out the window. She can see her family's apple orchard below... rows of budding trees stretching all the way to the surrounding forest.

The thought of apples makes Alya's stomach rumble. What's for breakfast?

doll house.description:
Alya runs her fingers along the tiny pine-wood shingles of the doll house roof. For years, her sister has been saying she'd soon grow out of it, but Alya never did. She still loves placing a new piece of miniature furniture in one of the house's many rooms for her dolls to enjoy.

She can't wait to tell them about her latest adventures!

desk.description:
A stack of letters, all from Henry, takes permanent residence on the polished surface of Alya's writing desk.

 (!) HINT: Use 'take <item>' to pick something up!

stitch-o-matic.description: Henry's latest invention: a clockwork gadget that can mend small tears in fabric. Handy!
stitch-o-matic.beforePickup: There's something enclosed with Henry's latest letter, which reads: "I hope you like my latest invention. I call it... the [b]Stitch-o-Matic[/b]! Just wind it up and let it rip! ...That is, [i]fix[/i] a rip. (It goes pretty fast, so be careful!)"

letter.description: A letter to Henry. Don't forget to post it!
letter.beforePickup: One of the [b]letters[/b] is Alya's response to Henry. She should post it before she leaves!

downstairs.name: Downstairs
downstairs.intro:
Alya goes downstairs. In the front hall, she's met with some wonderful aromas: freshly brewed coffee, sizzling pork, and baked cinnamon apples.

Alya follows her nose to the dining room. [b]Father[/b] is there, standing by the long table, looking expectant. He smiles when Alya comes in.
